janitor.useForm: Please contact the janitors through the contact form below. That way your message will contain all the relevant details the janitors need to process your request. If you want to write an email directly, make sure to adhere to the formal guideline below. In case of an emergency you may call them.

formalGuideline.title: Formal Guideline for Emails
formalGuideline.subj: If you write me an email, please inlcude the following information in the subject line: Residence, room/apartment No, short description of your request.
formalGuideline.ex3:
Hilton, 08-15, Spülarmatur defekt
oder
Turmstraße 1, 08-15, UM, Spülarmatur defekt
oder
T1, 08-15, UM, Spülarmatur defekt
formalGuideline.sublease: Capital "UM" after the room/apartment number means sublease.
formalGuideline.missingAddress: If the residence or the room/apartment number is missing, I will delete the email. I don't have time or the capacity to remember 500 names or figure the residence out.
formalGuideline.subjectGerman: Note: Please always write the subject line in German!
